name: Berkay Gündüz
label: Software Developer
summary: Software Developer with experience in full-stack development, software analysis, and deep learning applications. Graduated with a B.S. in Computer Science from Bilkent University. Skilled in Python, Java, C/C++, TypeScript, Fast API, Django, Vue.js, TensorFlow, MySQL, Git, Bash Script, Docker, and Linux. Strong background in OOP, software analysis, and deep learning.

work.summary: Developing software analysis solutions for the DETANGLE Analysis Suite using Python, Django, Vue.js, Git, and Jira.

Developed full-stack solutions for the STAR project - Turkcell’s network discovery, inventory, and alarm management software. Utilized Python, Django, REST API, SOAP API, MySQL, JavaScript, jQuery, Git, and Linux technologies.
Developed a network discovery script and solutions for major issues using Python, Django, SOAP API, Git, and Linux technologies.

courses: 414th rank over 2.5 million in the Higher Education Institutions Exam
Graduated as valedictorian from the high school before university

projects.name: geddit
projects.description: A Django API service to wrap Reddit posts

projects.name: Moondark
projects.description: Aims to generate music like Beethoven's Moonlight Sonata and Erik Satie's Gymnopédie 1 with LSTM using Python 3 and TensorFlow

projects.name: Lucid Dreams
projects.description: A 2D platformer game with the feature of a custom-level editor using Java and PostgreSQL

projects.name: Ozan
projects.description: A collection of projects that aims to create songs like Turkish folk musician Aşık Veysel with artificial neural networks using Python for TÜBITAK 2204-A High School Students Research Students Competition

volunteering.summary: Maintenance of the WordPress websites of the Department of Computer Engineering and Faculty of Engineering. Lab tutor for CS 115 - Introduction to Programming in Python, and for CS 102 Algorithms and Programming II (Java).

Led various organizations with 500+ participants as the chair of the Computer Society, including sessions with tech companies, programming contests, meetings with alums, and Python and Java programming tutorials.

certificates.title: Mustafa Akgül Free Software Summer Camp Python 3 Programming

activities.name: Google Developers Machine Learning Bootcamp
activities.summary: Participant. Learned fundamentals of neural networks, machine learning, deep learning, convolutional neural networks, natural language processing, and RNN, and programming deep learning solutions using Python and TensorFlow.

activities.name: Google Code-In
activities.summary: Participant Developer. Completed several tasks given by Fedora Project and Copyleft Games using skills in Python programming and Linux.

activities.name: TÜBİTAK 2204-A
activities.summary: Regional third degree at TÜBİTAK (The Scientific and Technical Research Council of Turkey) 2204-A High School Students Research Students Competition. Achieved 3rd Rank.
